whatIsYourNameInsetHeading: What information we'll show on the public list of authorised agents
whatIsYourNameInsetText: We'll show your name on the public list of authorised agents, unless you have a different business name that you trade under.
error-invalidFirstNameFormat: First name must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-invalidMiddleNameFormat: Middle name or names must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-invalidLastNameFormat: Last name must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-invalidFirstNameLength: First name must be 50 characters or fewer
error-invalidMiddleNameLength: Middle names must be 50 characters or fewer
error-invalidLastNameLength: Last name must be 160 characters or fewer
